* Reduced firing noise * Reduced weapon damage * No muzzle flash
Suppressors, or silencers, dampen the firing sound of weapons and reduce the muzzle flash, greatly enhancing weapon usage for covert operations and night fighting

* Redução dos ruídos de disparos * Reduz os danos da arma * Sem luzes na ponta
Supressores, ou silenciadores, minimizam os efeitos sonoros dos disparos das armas e os reflexos emitidos, garantindo uma melhora nos combates silenciosos e operações noturnas

* Reduced firing noise * Reduced weapon damage * No muzzle flash
Suppressors, or silencers, dampen the firing sound of weapons and reduce the muzzle flash, greatly enhancing weapon usage for covert operations and night fighting.

* Redução dos ruídos de disparos * Reduz os danos da arma * Sem luzes na ponta
Supressores, ou silenciadores, minimizam os efeitos sonoros dos disparos das armas e os reflexos emitidos, garantindo uma melhora nos combates silenciosos e operações noturnas.

* Adds grenade launcher fire-mode * Fires HE rifle grenades * 5 meters minimum arming distance
Underbarrel grenade launcher for added area effect and indirect fire capabilities. The GL fires advanced 30mm grenades with a high-explosive anti-personal shrapnel warhead.

* Adiciona um lança granadas no modo de tiro * Dispare que ele Solta Granadas * 5 metros mínimos de distância
Use o lançador de granadas para efeitos de área e capacidades adicionais de fogo indireto. Dispara uma granada de 30mm GL com uma ogiva explosiva, soltando estilhaços mortais.

* Adds semi-auto fire-mode * Increased accuracy and damage * Reduced rate of fire
Switching to semi-automatic fire allows to fire single shots instead of rapid or burst fire, which greatly increases accuracy and effectiveness, while reducing the cyclic rate of the weapon on the other hand.

* Adiciona o modo de tiro semi-automático * Aumenta a precisão e os danos * Reduz a taxa de tiro
Mudando para o modo semi-automático, permite disparar tiros únicos em vez de rajadas, o que aumenta a precisão e eficácia, reduzindo a taxa de disparos da arma.

* Adds semi-auto fire-mode * Increased accuracy and damage * Reduced rate of fire
Switching to semi-automatic fire allows to fire single shots instead of rapid or burst fire, which greatly increases accuracy and effectiveness, while reducing the cyclic rate of the weapon on the other hand.

* Adiciona o modo de tiro semi-automático * Aumenta a precisão e os danos * Reduz a taxa de tiro
Mudando para o modo semi-automático, permite disparar tiros únicos em vez de rajadas, o que aumenta a precisão e eficácia, reduzindo a taxa de disparos da arma.

* Adds gauss fire-mode * Strong armor penetration * Holds only limited ammunition
The miniature underbarrel anti-material gauss weapon fires single high-powered 10mm solid slugs at extreme velocities, allowing to punch through reinforced targets and lightly armored vehicles.

* Adiciona o Gauss ao modo de tiro * Forte penetração da armadura * Mantém somente a munição ilimitada
A miniatura da arma gauss anti-material é a única de alta potência com balas de 10mm balas sólidas e com velocidades extremas, o que permite perfurar alvos reforçados e veículos levemente blindados.

* Adds shotgun fire-mode * Holds several rounds internally * Short-range only
The lightweight, pump-action underbarrel shotgun improves a weapon's close quarter combat capabilities, allowing to rapidly engage multiple targets up-close with lethal .12 gauge shot rounds.

* Adiciona no modo de tiro da escopeta * Mantém vários cartuchos internos * Somente curto-alcance
O leve, mas eficaz acessório para escopeta melhora a capacidade de uma arma de combate próximo, permitindo o rápido ataque a alvos próximos, com balas letais de calibre .12 no cartucho.

* 3.5x zoom magnification * Reduced peripheral view * Less accurate while moving
Assault scopes are combat optics that increase a rifle's effective range over iron sights and position it closer to ranged sniper weapons without the same loss of situational awareness for nearby threats

* 3.5x zoom magnification * Reduced peripheral view * Less accurate while moving
Assault scopes are combat optics that increase a rifle's effective range over iron sights and position it closer to ranged sniper weapons without the same loss of situational awareness for nearby threats

* 10x zoom magnification * Loss of peripheral view * Reduced accuracy while moving
Sniper scopes are long telescopic sights that enable to reach out and engage targets at long distances. The increase in range is paid for with loss of mobility and reduced effectiveness against close threats

* Aumento de 10x no zomm * Perda da Visão periférica * Reduz a precisão quando se move
Lunetas de Rifle são miras telescópicas que permitem alcançar e atingir alvos a longa distância. O aumento do alcance é pago com a perda da mobilidade e redução de eficácia contra as ameaças próximas

* Improved accuracy while moving * Better view on the target
Reflex or red dot sights, are a step up from iron sights, reflecting a reticle image onto a combining glass for superimposition on the target. Just put the red dot where you want to hit and squeeze the trigger

* Aumenta a precisão quando se move * Melhor visão do alvo
Miras de Reflexo ou de Ponto vermelho, estão um degrau acima das miras de ferro, refletindo uma imagem da retícula sobre um vidro em combinação com a sobreposição no alvo. Basta colocar o ponto vermelho, onde você quer atingir e apertar o gatilho

* Greatly improves hip-shot accuracy * Improved accuracy while moving * Laser beam gives away own position
Laser sights emit a visible-light laser beam parallel to the barrel of a weapon, allowing quick point-and-shoot techniques and increasing the hit probability when firing on the move

* Ótima melhora na precisão * Melhora a precisão quando se move * O laser pode denunciar sua posição
Mira laser emite um feixe de um visível laser em paralelo com o cano da arma, permitindo técnicas rápidas de apontar e atirar e aumentando a probabilidade de acerto dos tiros quando em movimento

* Greatly improves hip-shot accuracy * Laser beam gives away own posiion
Laser sights emit a visible-light laser beam parallel to the barrel of a weapon, allowing quick point-and-shoot techniques and increasing the hit probability when firing on the move.

* Melhora muito a precisão do tiro * O laser pode denunciar sua posição
Mira laser emite um feixe de um visível laser em paralelo com o cano da arma, permitindo técnicas rápidas de apontar e atirar e aumentando a probabilidade de acerto dos tiros quando em movimento.

* Large peripheral view * Precise aiming * Less accurate while moving
Iron sights allow to engage enemies with accurate fire over distance. Although not as convenient as mounted optics, iron sights are very reliable and greatly increase a weapon's effective combat range

* Grande visão periférica * Aponta rapidamente * Pouca precisão quando se move
Miras de Ferro permitem atacar inimigos com diapros precisos a uma certa distância. Embora não seja tão conveniente quanto a mira óptica está montada, as miras de ferro são muito confiáveis e aumentam muito a eficácia das armas em combates próximos

* Extra ammo in magazine * Takes longer to reload * Does not increase max ammo
High-capacity magazine that holds additional ammunition over standard issue magazines, enabling prolonged firing until required to reload

* Munição extra no espaço * Leva mais tempo para recarregar * Não aumenta até a munição máxima
Espaços de alta capacidade que contém munição adicional acima da edição do espaço padrão, que permite disparos prolongados até ser necessário recarregar

Great all-round class perfect for short-medium range combat
Classe grande, perfeita para combate de curto e médio alcance
Stealth-focused assault class best suited to sneaking around and surprising the enemy from close-range
Classe de assalto Disfarçado, focado para se esgueirar e surpreender o inimigo em curto alcance
Specializes in long-range combat and dealing with unsuspecting enemies from distance
Especialista no combate de longo alcance para lidar com inimigos desavisados em longa distância

Team-based death match. Work together to kill enemies and hit the score limit
Jogo de morte com base em equipes. Trabalhar em conjunto para matar os inimigos e atingir o limite de pontuação
Team-based death match with a maximum of 4 players per side. Kill enemies to score points and reach the score limit to win
Jogo de morte com base em equipes com um máximo de 4 jogadores de cada lado. Mate os inimigos para marcar pontos e atingir o limite de pontuação para vencer
Free for all death match. Kill enemies and score the most points within the time limit to win
Livre para todos encontrarem a morte. Mate os inimigos e marque mais pontos dentro do limite de tempo para ganhar
Round-based mode. Nanosuit Operatives must upload data from terminals defended by standard soldiers. 1 life only
Modo baseado em rodadas. Operários de Nanosuit devem enviar dados de terminais defendidos por soldados padrão. Uma só vida
Round-based mode. Capture the enemy relay and return it to your base to score. The team with the most capture points wins
Modo baseado em rodadas. Capture o Transmissor inimigo e devolva-o à sua base de pontuação. A equipe com mais pontos ganha a captura

Team-based capture and hold mode. Secure the active alien drop pod sites to score points. The longer your team holds a pod, the more points you'll get. Over time pods will explode and new pods will arrive. Score the most points to win

Modo baseado em equipes de capturar e manter. Proteja as cápsulas alienígenas para marcar pontos. Quanto mais a sua equipe manter uma cápsula, mais pontos você vai conseguir. Ao longo do tempo, as cápsulas vão explodir e novas chegarão. Consiga mais pontos para ganhar
Round-based mode. Alien Bio-Ticks must be captured and delivered to extraction points. Successful extractions enhance Nanosuit powers
Modo baseado em rodadas. Os Bio-Tecidos alienígenas devem ser capturados e entregues aos pontos de extração. Extrações com sucesso aumentam os poderes da Nanosuit

Combinaçãos dos mapas de Ação Instantânea em Equipe e Locais Destruídos

Follow the drop ship to see where the pod will land

Entering an enemy crash site will stop them scoring points
Se você entrar em um local de impacto, irá para a soma pontos do inimigo.
Points are not earned when both teams are next to a crash site
Quando os dois times estão perto do local de impacto, pontos não seram somados.
Crashed pods become unstable - get points before they explode
Ccápsulas danificadas são instáveis. Consiga os itens antes de explodirem!
Standing too close to a pod when it crash-lands can be fatal
Ficar muito perto de uma cápsula quando ela se iluminar pode ser fatal.
Only secondary weapons can be used while carrying the relay
Armas secundárias só podem ser usadas quando carregar um transmissor.
Touch a dropped team relay to return it to your base
Toque em um transmissor caído de uma equipe para retornar à sua base.
Dropped relays automatically return to their base after 30 seconds
Os transmissores que caem automaticamente retornam à sua base após 30 segundos.
When an enemy has the relay the icon will update every second
Quando um inimigo deixa o transmissor, o ícone será atualizado para o segundo.
In Assault only the attacking team have Nanosuits
No assalto, somente a equipe atacante tem Nanosuit.
In Assault, uploading intel highlights that terminal to the enemy
No assalto, enviar informação faz com que o terminal seja destaque para o inimigo.
In Assault the attackers can upload intel from any terminal
No assalto, os atacantes podem enviar dados a partir de qualquer terminal.
In Assault the time taken uploading intel can be crucial
No assalto, o tempo gasto com a informação pode ser crucial.
Custom classes are not available in Assault
As classes personalizadas não estão disponíveis no assalto.
Bio-ticks give Nanosuit power-ups to whoever owns them
Os bio-tecidos dão a Nanosuit poderes para aqueles que a tem!
Defenders cannot return dropped bio-ticks, they return automatically
Os defensores não podem perder os bio-tecidos. Serão devolvidos automaticamente.
In Extraction the attackers must extract both bio-ticks to win
Na extração, os atacantes devem remover ambos os bio-tecidos para ganhar.
Extraction helicopters have a Nanosuit drain defense system
Helicópteros de evacuação têm um sistema de defesa contra Nanosuit.
In Extraction, attackers benefit from bio-ticks carried or extracted
Na extração, os atacantes obtem os benefícios dos bio-tecidos que carregam ou removem.
In Extraction, defenders benefit from bio-ticks at their base
Na extração, os defensores recebem os benefícios dos bio-tecidos que estão na sua base.
The defenders must hold at least one bio-tick to win
Os defensores devem manter um mínimo de bio-tecidos para vencer.
Use Maximum Radar to reveal enemy players on the radar
O Radar Máximo é usado para mostrar os jogadores inimigos no radar.
Teammates in Stealth are highlighted in the team color
Parceiros em Disfarce são destacados com a cor da equipe.
Use Radar Jammer to block enemy radar displays
Use a interferência do transmissor de radar para bloquear imagens de radar inimigo.
Use the visor to tag enemies and highlight them to teammates
Use a viseira para ver inimigos e enviá-las para parceiros.
Armor mode reduces damage taken but slows movement
A Armadura reduz o dano que você sofre, mas faz você ir mais devagar.
Enemies in Stealth mode are harder to see at distance
É mais difícil ver os inimigos Disfarçados a longas distâncias.
Shooting while in Stealth mode overloads the Nanosuit
Se você atirar enquanto Disfarçado, sobre-carregará a Nanosuit.
Shoot a sprinting enemy to slow them down
Atire em um inimigo correndo para diminuir seus movimentos.
In Armor mode the Nanosuit provides additional fall protection
No Modo Armadura, a Nanosuit oferece proteção adicional.
The Mk.60 is inaccurate when fired on the move
A Mk.60 é muito imprecisa se disparada enquanto se move.
Use Stealth mode to cross open ground undetected
Use a Camuflagem para atravessar um espaço aberto sem ser detectado.
Armor mode provides extra protection from explosives
O Modo Armadura fornece proteção adicional contra explosivos.

O X43-Mike pode penetrar a blindagem da Nanosuit.

Os disparos da K-Volt consomem a energia da Nanosuit.

No modo Camuflagem, fique atrás de um inimigo para matá-lo silenciosamente!
Study the kill replay to work out what went wrong...
Estude o replay da morte para descobrir onde errou...
Use the JAW's laser beam to guide the rockets
Use o raio laser usado para guiar foguetes JAW.
Gauss bullets completely drain Nanosuit energy
Balas Gauss consomem completamente a energia da Nanosuit.
The Shotgun attachment is powerful at close range
A Escopeta é a arma mais poderosa a curta distância.
Use the Gauss attachment to increase effective range
Use o acessório Gauss para aumentar o alcance dos danos.
Use the Hologram attachment to trick enemies
Use o acessório de Holograma para enganar o inimigo.
Adding attachments to weapons will make them heavier
Se você adicionar acessórios, as armas seram mais pesadas.
For increased range try fitting an Assault Scope
Tente colocar uma Luneta de Assalto para maior alcance.
Choose suit modules to compliment your play style
Escolha os módulos de acordo com seu estilo de jogo.
Upgrade Nanosuit modes to unlock new suit modules
Melhore os Modos da Nanosuit para desbloquear novos módulos.
Your L-TAG grenades and JAW rockets won't explode near you
Suas granadas L-TAG e foguetes JAW não podem explodir perto de você.
Complete weapon Skill Assessments to unlock attachments
Complete as Avaliações de Habilidade e Armas para desbloquear acessórios.
Firing will reveal your location on enemy radars
Disparar irá revelar a sua posição no radar inimigo.
Perform team actions to earn the Most Valuable Player accolade

Switching to a secondary weapon is faster than reloading
Alternar para a arma secundária é mais rápido que recarregar.
The Ceph Gunship's weak spot is its generator
A fraqueza da Aeronave Ceph é o seu gerador.
Keep an eye on your Nanosuit energy levels...
Não tire os olhos do nível de energia da Nanosuit...
Complete Skill Assessments to earn bonus XP
Complete as Avaliações de Habilidade para adquirir bônus de PE.

Track your progress in the Operative Status menu

Double-tap the change weapon button to equip explosives

Compare your stats on the global leaderboards

Perform Skill Kills to earn bonus XP
Faça Assassinatos Habilidosos para ganhar bônus de PE.
The Sniper Scope has a two-stage zoom
A Luneta de Atirador tem um zoom de duas fases.
Firing on the move reduces your accuracy
Disparar enquanto se move irá perder a precisão.
You can fire your gun while sliding
Você pode disparar a arma enquanto desliza.
Tap crouch while sprinting to perform a slide
Agache enquanto corre para executar um deslize.
Dog tag medals are awarded for completing secret tasks
Ao completar missões secretas, receberá medalhas de Dog Tag.
Level up your suit modules to unlock new abilities
Aumente o nível dos módulos da Nanosuit para desbloquear novas habilidades.
You can power jump out of water when near the surface
Você pode dar um salto poderoso da água se estiver perto da superfície.
Jump and move forwards to grab onto ledges
Salte e ande para agarrar as bordas.

III. What Is Non-Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

Non-personal information, alone, cannot be used to identify or contact you. Crytek collects non-personal information about your use of our online and mobile products and services both on our website and in the course of game play and software usage (on PC, mobile and console platforms).

A. What Types of Non-Personal Information Does Crytek Collect?

When you use Crytek online and mobile products and services or you play our games on your PC or console, we may collect certain non-personal demographic information including gender, zip code, information about your computer, hardware, software, platform, media, mobile device . We also collect other non-personal information such as feature usage, game play statistics and scores, user rankings and click paths as well as other data that you may provide in surveys, via your account preferences and online profiles or through purchases, for instance. We may also receive either non-personal or public information from third parties in connection with market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you.

III. What Is Non-Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

A. What Types of Non-Personal Information Does Crytek Collect?

We may also receive either non-personal or public information from third parties in connection with market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you.

B. How Does Crytek Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. In addition, we might use cookies and other technologies to passively collect non-personal demographic information, personalize your experience on our sites and monitor advertisements and other activities.

B. How Does Crytek Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. In addition, we might use cookies and other technologies to passively collect non-personal demographic information, personalize your experience on our sites and monitor advertisements and other activities.

1. Cookies

Cookies are small files applied to your Internet browser to track movements within websites. We may link cookie information to personal information. Cookies link to information regarding what items you have selected for purchase at our store, pages you have viewed, or games you have played. This information is used to keep track of your shopping cart and make sure you don't see the same ad repeatedly, for example. Also, we use cookies to deliver content specific to your interest and to monitor website or game usage. We collect information on what games are played, how much time is spent playing the games and which ads or links are clicked. Some of our sites use an outside ad company to display ads. These ads contain cookies. Cookies received with banner ads are applied by our ad companies, and Crytek does not have access to this information. Most browsers are automatically set to accept cookies whenever you visit a website. You can disable cookies or set your browser to alert you when cookies are being sent. To disable your cookies, please visit www.mycrysis.com/support.

We may also use flash cookies, also known as "local shared objects," on our sites that employ Flash technology. Flash cookies are small files similar to browser cookies and are used to remember the site's settings to personalize the look and feel of the site. Flash cookies only collect data in the aggregate. Like normal cookies, Flash cookies are represented as small files on your computer. One method of preventing Flash cookies from being placed is to adjust your preferences in the Macromedia Website Privacy Settings Panel at www.macromedia.com.

Please note that this privacy policy covers the use of cookies by Crytek only and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.

IV. What Happens To The Information Crytek Collects?

A. How Crytek Uses Your Information

Crytek uses your information to operate Crytek’s games, fulfill your specific requests, purchase orders and to send you purchase confirmation and other account-related information. In addition, if you choose to receive communications from us about Crytek products and news, the personal information you provide will allow us to send you messages about things including new products, features, enhancements, special offers, upgrade opportunities, contests and events of interest. You may also later opt out of this service from Crytek.

2. Third Party Ad Serving Technology

IV. What Happens To The Information Crytek Collects?

A. How Crytek Uses Your Information

Crytek uses your information to operate Crytek’s games, fulfill your specific requests, purchase orders and to send you purchase confirmation and other account-related information. In addition, if you choose to receive communications from us about Crytek products and news, the personal information you provide will allow us to send you messages about things including new products, features, enhancements, special offers, upgrade opportunities, contests and events of interest. You may also later opt out of this service from Crytek.

Your participation in tournaments or other online game events is also conditional upon our collection, use, storage, transmission and public display of statistical data (such as your scores, rankings and achievements) generated through your participation.

B. Will Crytek Share My Information With Third Parties?

Crytek will never share your personal information with third parties without your consent. We may, however, share non-personal data in the aggregate (in a form that does not personally identify you) with third parties. You may also opt in to allow Crytek to share your personal information with companies and organizations that provide products or services that we believe may be of interest to you. To opt out of further communications from a marketing partner or sponsor with whom your information has been shared, please contact that partner or sponsor directly.

From time to time, Crytek employs third party contractors to collect personal information on our behalf to provide email delivery, product, or promotional fulfillment, contest administration, credit card processing, shipping or other services on our sites. When requesting these services, you may be asked to supply your name, mailing address, telephone number and email address to our contractors. We ask some third party contractors, such as credit agencies or market research firms, to supplement personal information that you provide to us for our own marketing and demographic studies, so that we can consistently improve our sites and related advertising to better meet our visitors' needs and preferences.

The security of your personal information is important to us. III. What Is Non-Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

Non-personal information, alone, cannot be used to identify or contact you. Crytek collects non-personal information about your use of our online and mobile products and services both on our website and in the course of game play and software usage (on PC, mobile and console platforms).

A. What Types of Non-Personal Information Does Crytek Collect?

When you use Crytek online and mobile products and services or you play our games on your PC or console, we may collect certain non-personal demographic information including gender, zip code, information about your computer, hardware, software, platform, media, mobile device . We also collect other non-personal information such as feature usage, game play statistics and scores, user rankings and click paths as well as other data that you may provide in surveys, via your account preferences and online profiles or through purchases, for instance. We may also receive either non-personal or public information from third parties in connection with market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you.

B. How Does Crytek Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. In addition, we might use cookies and other technologies to passively collect non-personal demographic information, personalize your experience on our sites and monitor advertisements and other activities.

III. What Is Non-Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

Non-personal information, alone, cannot be used to identify or contact you. Crytek collects non-personal information about your use of our online and mobile products and services both on our website and in the course of game play and software usage (on PC, mobile and console platforms).

We also collect other non-personal information such as feature usage, game play statistics and scores, user rankings and click paths as well as other data that you may provide in surveys, via your account preferences and online profiles or through purchases, for instance. We may also receive either non-personal or public information from third parties in connection with market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you.

B. How Does Crytek Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. In addition, we might use cookies and other technologies to passively collect non-personal demographic information, personalize your experience on our sites and monitor advertisements and other activities.

1. Cookies

Cookies are small files applied to your Internet browser to track movements within websites. We may link cookie information to personal information. Cookies link to information regarding what items you have selected for purchase at our store, pages you have viewed, or games you have played. This information is used to keep track of your shopping cart and make sure you don't see the same ad repeatedly, for example. Also, we use cookies to deliver content specific to your interest and to monitor website or game usage. We collect information on what games are played, how much time is spent playing the games and which ads or links are clicked. Some of our sites use an outside ad company to display ads. These ads contain cookies. Cookies received with banner ads are applied by our ad companies, and Crytek does not have access to this information. Most browsers are automatically set to accept cookies whenever you visit a website. You can disable cookies or set your browser to alert you when cookies are being sent. To disable your cookies, please visit www.mycrysis.com/support.

We may also use flash cookies, also known as "local shared objects," on our sites that employ Flash technology. Flash cookies are small files similar to browser cookies and are used to remember the site's settings to personalize the look and feel of the site. Flash cookies only collect data in the aggregate. Like normal cookies, Flash cookies are represented as small files on your computer. One method of preventing Flash cookies from being placed is to adjust your preferences in the Macromedia Website Privacy Settings Panel at www.macromedia.com.

Please note that this privacy policy covers the use of cookies by Crytek only and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.

IV. What Happens To The Information Crytek Collects?

A. How Crytek Uses Your Information

Crytek uses your information to operate Crytek’s games, fulfill your specific requests, purchase orders and to send you purchase confirmation and other account-related information. In addition, if you choose to receive communications from us about Crytek products and news, the personal information you provide will allow us to send you messages about things including new products, features, enhancements, special offers, upgrade opportunities, contests and events of interest. You may also later opt out of this service from Crytek.

Your participation in tournaments or other online game events is also conditional upon our collection, use, storage, transmission and public display of statistical data (such as your scores, rankings and achievements) generated through your participation.

B. Will Crytek Share My Information With Third Parties?

Crytek will never share your personal information with third parties without your consent. We may, however, share non-personal data in the aggregate (in a form that does not personally identify you) with third parties. You may also opt in to allow Crytek to share your personal information with companies and organizations that provide products or services that we believe may be of interest to you. To opt out of further communications from a marketing partner or sponsor with whom your information has been shared, please contact that partner or sponsor directly.

V. Where Is The Information Held?

Crytek is a global organization and the majority of the computer systems on which Crytek collects, stores, and uses the information it collects or receives are based in the Germany. Under limited circumstances, we may utilize data storage facilities located in the European Union, the USA and/or Asia. Your personal information may be transferred to, used, processed or held by Crytek in Germany and in other countries, including countries both in and outside the European Union, and used for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

VI. How Does Crytek Protect Your Personal Information?

The security of your personal information is important to us. We follow generally accepted industry standards to protect the personal information submitted to us, both during transmission and in storage. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, while we strive to use commercially reasonable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any questions about security on our website, you can contact the Privacy Policy Administrator in your country listed on our site at privacy@crytek.com.

I. Crytek Online Privacy Policy: Introduction

Crytek GmbH and its subsidiary companies (Crytek) respect the privacy rights of consumers and recognize the importance of protecting the information collected about you. We have adopted this global Privacy Policy to explain how we store and use personal and non-personal information we collect online on our websites, during your use of our online products and/or services (including online game play) and on mobile platforms.

II. What Is Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

Crytek collects both personal and non-personal consumer information. Personal information collected by Crytek is discussed below in this section. Non-personal information is discussed below in Section III.

I. Crytek® Online Privacy Policy: Introduction

Crytek® GmbH and its subsidiary companies (Crytek®) respect the privacy rights of consumers and recognize the importance of protecting the information collected about you. We have adopted this global Privacy Policy to explain how we store and use personal and non-personal information we collect online on our websites, during your use of our online products and/or services (including online game play) and on mobile platforms.

II. What Is Personal Information And When Does Crytek® Collect It?

Crytek® collects both personal and non-personal consumer information. Personal information collected by Crytek® is discussed below in this section. Non-personal information is discussed below in Section III.

Information collected will vary depending upon the activity and may include your name, user name, email address, password, phone number, home address, country, birth date, mobile phone number and credit card or other payment method information but will only be saved when needed. You will be specifically notified in case of irregular collection of data.

Crytek also may maintain log files which contain IP addresses. An IP address is a numeric address that may be assigned to your computer by your Internet Service Provider. In general, we use log files to monitor traffic on our websites and to troubleshoot technical problems and will delete IP addresses after 7 days. In the event of user abuse of our websites, however, we may block certain IP addresses. If available, IP addresses and console IDs may be used to personally identify you in order to enforce our Terms of Service.

B. Personal Information Provided To Crytek By Third Parties.

If you sign up to play Crytek games through a PlayStation®3 computer entertainment system, your PlayStation®Network account information might be provided to Crytek so that we can establish an Crytek Online account for you. You need a Crytek Online account to play Crytek's titles online with full features. By signing up to play Crytek's titles, you agree that limited user account information can be transferred to Crytek. Information transferred to Crytek may include your name, email address, Online ID, country, language, game telemetry, score trophies, rankings and date of birth but does not include credit card number or other financial account information.

2. Other Information Collected From Third Parties

We may also receive other personal information from third parties in connection with the operation and distribution of our products and services as well as market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you. As with all other information, we use this data only for purposes consistent with this policy.

III. What Is Non-Personal Information And When Does Crytek Collect It?

Non-personal information, alone, cannot be used to identify or contact you. Crytek collects non-personal information about your use of our online and mobile products and services both on our website and in the course of game play and software usage (on mobile and home systems).

A. What Types of Non-Personal Information Does Crytek Collect?

When you use Crytek online and mobile products and services or you play our games on your system, we may collect certain non-personal demographic information including gender, zip code, information about your computer, hardware, software, platform, media, mobile device . We also collect other non-personal information such as feature usage, game play statistics and scores, user rankings and select paths as well as other data that you may provide in surveys, via your account preferences and online profiles or through purchases, for instance. We may also receive either non-personal or public information from third parties in connection with market and demographic studies that we use to supplement personal information provided directly by you.

B. How Does Crytek Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. B. How Does Crytek® Collect Non-Personal Information?

Crytek® collects non-personal information in addition to personal information when you actively provide it in the context of various online and mobile activities including online and mobile purchases, game registration and marketing surveys, for instance. In addition, we might use cookies and other technologies to passively collect non-personal demographic information, personalize your experience on our sites and monitor advertisements and other activities.

1. Cookies

Cookies are small files applied to your Internet browser to track movements within websites. We may link cookie information to personal information. Cookies link to information regarding what items you have selected for purchase at our store, pages you have viewed, or games you have played. This information is used to keep track of your shopping cart and make sure you don't see the same ad repeatedly, for example. Also, we use cookies to deliver content specific to your interest and to monitor website or game usage. We collect information on what games are played, how much time is spent playing the games and which ads or links are selected. Some of our sites use an outside ad company to display ads. These ads contain cookies. Cookies received with banner ads are applied by our ad companies, and Crytek does not have access to this information. Most browsers are automatically set to accept cookies whenever you visit a website. You can disable cookies or set your browser to alert you when cookies are being sent. To disable your cookies, please visit www.mycrysis.com/support.

We may also use flash cookies, also known as "local shared objects," on our sites that employ Flash technology. Flash cookies are small files similar to browser cookies and are used to remember the site's settings to personalize the look and feel of the site. Flash cookies only collect data in the aggregate. Like normal cookies, Flash cookies are represented as small files on your system. One method of preventing Flash cookies from being placed is to adjust your preferences in the Macromedia Website Privacy Settings Panel at www.macromedia.com.

Please note that this privacy policy covers the use of cookies by Crytek only and does not cover the use of cookies by any advertisers.

Your participation in tournaments or other online game events is also conditional upon our collection, use, storage, transmission and public display of statistical data (such as your scores, rankings and trophies) generated through your participation.

V. Where Is The Information Held?

Crytek is a global organization and the majority of the computer systems on which Crytek collects, stores, and uses the information it collects or receives are based in the Germany. Under limited circumstances, we may utilize data storage facilities located in the European Union, the USA and/or Asia. Your personal information may be transferred to, used, processed or held by Crytek in Germany and in other countries, including countries both in and outside the European Union, and used for the purposes set out in this Privacy Policy.

VI. How Does Crytek Protect Your Personal Information?

The security of your personal information is important to us. We follow generally accepted industry standards to protect the personal information submitted to us, both during transmission and in storage. No method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage, is 100% secure, however. Therefore, while we strive to use commercially reasonable means to protect your personal information, we cannot guarantee its absolute security. If you have any questions about security on our website, you can contact the Privacy Policy Administrator in your country listed on our site at privacy@crytek.com.
